items.q: My sister goes to school ________________________ the University of Oregon.

Chris and James ________________________ (is / am / are) at the gym.
The concert ________________________ (is / was / were) at 7:00 last night.
Her parents ________________________ (is / am/ are) very nice.
The students ________________________ (is / was / were) late for class yesterday.
There ________________________ a grocery store next to the post office.
There ________________________ some good restaurants in my neighborhood.
There ________________________ three tigers in the zoo.
There ________________________ not a time limit on the test.
There ________________________ a beautiful park downtown.
My mother is from Peru _____
There are five people in my family _____
Where are you from _____
What time does the movie start _____

I pay my bills every week. a. subject b. verb c. object
Elias likes action movies. a. subject b. verb c. object
They drink coffee every morning. a. subject b. verb c. object
Patricia runs four miles every day. a. subject b. verb c. object
Charlie cleans his car once a month. a. subject b. verb c. object
The Golden Gate Bridge is in San francisco . a. Golden b. Gate c. Bridge d. francisco
We leave for vacation at the end of august . a. We b. vacation c. end d. august
My friend alex lives in New York City . a. friend b. alex c. New d. City
they play soccer every Friday afternoon . a. they b. soccer c. Friday d. afternoon
The gym is open until nine o'clock on mondays . a. gym b. nine c. on d. mondays
to understand a. to add b. to know c. to read
ingredients a. to read with b. to write with c. to cook with
cheap a. free b. low price c. high price
finally a. the last b. the next c. the first
to attend a. to forget something b. to be present c. to watch
to enjoy a. to laugh b. to dislike c. to like
a sentence a. a group of words b. a group of numbers c. a group of letters
a region a. a size b. a place c. a time
simple a. difficult b. not difficult c. complex
famous a. friendly b. well known c. professional
an unexpected _____
_____ for a big company
_____ cream to your coffee
a _____ restaurant
take a _____
Pleasant Street / on / there is / an excellent restaurant _______________________________
in the yard / the two puppies / played _______________________________
a professor / is / Julie / at the local university _______________________________
at a seafood restaurant / and his mother / ate dinner / Mark __________________________
is / grandfather / in Italy / right now / Rosa's _______________________________
A class is something you attend.
An onion is something you eat.
When you are surprised , you know what will happen.
A movie is something you read.
If you cut something up , it stays the same size.
Write about your favorite season. Why do you like this season? What is the weather like in this season? What kind of activities do you do in this season?
